Dwarakh Raja is an Indian Film Director and Screenwriter who works in the Tamil Film Industry. He made his Directorial debut with  Kadhal Kasakuthaiya(2017).He started his career by making Short Films. He received accolades for his Tamil Short Film "Tanglish"  under the category "Best Director" at 1st SIIMA Short Film Awards. His last directional venture was Parole (2022 film). He also works as lyricist for his Film Songs.
